statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_monitoring;
SELECT product_name, current_inventory FROM inventory_monitoring WHERE current_inventory < reorder_level;
SELECT supplier_name FROM inventory_monitoring WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, supplier_name FROM inventory_monitoring ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_monitoring WHERE current_inventory > reorder_level ORDER BY current_inventory DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_monitoring WHERE current_inventory < reorder_level ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT supplier_name, current_inventory FROM inventory_monitoring WHERE supplier_id = 3 ORDER BY current_inventory ASC
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, current_inventory FROM inventory_monitoring WHERE current_inventory BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, current_inventory DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_inventory FROM inventory_monitoring WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM inventory_monitoring WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%'
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE supplier_id = 1 ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items FROM suppliers INNER JOIN inventory ON suppliers.supplier_id = inventory.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM SupplierData LIMIT 5
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, quantity FROM SupplierData WHERE supplier_id = 1
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, price FROM SupplierData ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_name, current_quantity FROM InternalInventory WHERE current_quantity < reorder_level
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, quantity, price FROM SupplierData JOIN ReplenishmentNeeds ON SupplierData.product_id = ReplenishmentNeeds.product_id
SELECT * FROM SupplierData ORDER BY supplier_id ASC, quantity DESC
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, price FROM SupplierData WHERE supplier_id = 100 AND product_id = 200
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM SupplierData GROUP BY supplier_name
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, quantity, price FROM SupplierData INNER JOIN InternalInventory ON SupplierData.product_id = InternalInventory.product_id

SELECT supplier_name, product_name, quantity, price FROM SupplierData WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM ReplenishmentNeeds WHERE expected_delivery_date > '2022-05-01') ORDER BY supplier_name
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity_ordered FROM orders WHERE quantity_ordered > 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity, last_replenishment_date FROM products p JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 100;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY last_replenishment_date DESC;
SELECT o.order_id, p.product_name, o.order_date FROM orders o JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_price > 50.00 ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM ReplenishmentNeeds WHERE status = 'pending' AND order_quantity >= 100;
SELECT system_name, system_type FROM InternalSystems ORDER BY system_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_price > 100 ORDER BY product_price ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM Suppliers JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id WHERE product_price < 50;
SELECT inventory_id, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY inventory_id DESC;
SELECT system_name, system_type FROM InternalSystems WHERE system_type = 'Database' ORDER BY system_name ASC;
